msgSnippet: Yes. This is true. The reason is to do with classloaders. Both Ant and JUnit employ their own custom classloaders and they don t play well together! (There is

Yes. This is true. The reason is to do with classloaders. Both Ant and JUni=
t employ their own custom classloaders and they don't play well together! (=
There is a long technical reason, but it's Monday morning, so "don't play w=
ell together" will have to do for now. ;-)

Simon "the mighty Mac user" Cha=
ppell
